bug.author: SkeletalDemise
bug.description:
Describe the bug Base62 decoding is not working properly. To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior:
What input did you use? ciphey -t "126hVJJr0BxMumjWTECjbf0W5wF4DFPXG1NcA" What flags / arguments did you use? N/A
Verbose Output N/A because it silently fails and there's no logging for Base62. Expected behavior That Ciphey can decode Base62 properly. Versions:
OS/Distro: Windows 10 Python version: Python 3.7.7 Ciphey versions: Ciphey 5.3.1, cipheycore 0.2.9, cipheydists 0.3.20
Additional context It seems the package that Ciphey uses to decode Base62 doesn't work.
